author: Don winckles

review: I purchased this because it's the cheapest media streamer on the market and if you need to stream Youtube or Netflix to your TV, this is your streamer.  However, it's streaming services are very limited.  There is no Amazon Instant Video support which is very disappointing and no screen mirroring from your phone.If you can still get this with the free Netflix, get it.  If not, then  hold off for version 2 or some more software upgrades.
author: Ryan

Only wish that BBC America wasn't doing an exclusive with Apple. A number of things from them I'd like to watch not least of all Classic Dr Who.

review: Good product easy to set up .can't beat the price. Just plugged it into my hdmi switched the corresponding input on my remote and set it up, takes 5 minutes. What I liked about this is that it gives you an option to plug it into an outlet or it comes with a usb cable to connect to a USB port on the  TV to power chrome cast. Like the fact that i can use my galaxy note 3 has a remote to pick the movies via Netflix app and play them on my TV. I can pick any movie during the day save them to my list and watch them when ever. Also one less box to dust off on my TV shelves. You can even see the chromecast device, so that's good if you like to avoid  Clutters of modems and cable box...etc. Overall good pruduct.
